casebody.data:
L. HIRSCHBERG & CO., Inc., Appellant, v. THE S. S. CATERINA GEROLIMICH, Navigazione Generale Gerolimich and Compania Societa in Azioni, Appellee. NAVIGAZIONE GENERALE GEROLIMICH and Compania Societa in Azioni, Cross-Appellee, v. L. HIRSCHBERG & CO., Inc., Cross-Appellant. Nos. 47, 48. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 9, 1931. Finkler & Finkler, of New York City, for Hirschberg. Kirlin, Campbell, Hiekox, Keating & Mc-Grann, of New York City (L. De Grove Potter and John J. Heckman, both of New York City, of counsel), for Gerolimieh.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [43 F.(2d) 248] affirmed.
